## [4.0.0](https://github.com/gulpjs/glob-parent/compare/v3.1.0...v4.0.0) (2021-01-27)


### ⚠ BREAKING CHANGES

* question marks are valid path characters on Windows so avoid flagging as a glob when alone
* Update is-glob dependency
